name: Cow Tipping
description:
Welcome to Cow Tipping - An exploration of autonomy, and a cow. This is a VR game in which it explores, and critiques the concept that players are autonomous within the medium of games. We wish the subvert the players expectations of the game by providing little control over experience.

Co-Creators
KLNDeveloper: https://klndeveloper.itch.io/
Yaqoob Isaacs: https://yaqoob-isaacs.itch.io/
Zotair Games: https://zotair.itch.io/
